original_text: It is like that for you. You are sad now. But I will see you again, and then you will be happy. You will be really happy. Nobody will be able to take away your joy.
korean_text: 지금은 너희가 근심하나 내가 다시 너희를 보리니 너희 마음이 기쁠 것이요 너희 기쁨을 빼앗을 자가 없으리라

sentences.original_text: It is like that for you.
But I will see you again,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 다시 너희를 보게 될 것이고,

sentences.original_text: and then you will be happy.
Nobody will be able to take away your joy.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 너희의 기쁨을 빼앗을 수 없을 것이다.
